filedate.c

00001 // filedate.c -- manage search paths
00002 
00003 #include "ext.h"
00004 #include "ext_path.h"
00005 #include "ext_strings.h"
00006 
00007 
00008 typedef struct filedate
00009 {
00010     t_object f_ob;
00011 } t_filedate;
00012 
00013 void *filedate_class;
00014 
00015 void filedate_assist(t_filedate *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00016 void filedate_doanything(t_filedate *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00017 void filedate_out(t_filedate *x, unsigned long date);
00018 void filedate_anything(t_filedate *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00019 void *filedate_new(void);
00020 
00021 t_symbol *ps_nothing, *ps_list;
00022 
00023 int main()
00024 {
00025     setup((t_messlist **)&filedate_class, (method)filedate_new,0L, (short)sizeof(t_filedate), 0L, 0);
00026     addmess((method)filedate_anything, "anything", A_GIMME, 0);
00027     addmess((method)filedate_assist,"assist",A_CANT,0);
00028     
00029     finder_addclass("System","filedate");
00030     
00031     ps_nothing = gensym("");
00032     ps_list = gensym("list");
00033     
00034     return (0);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void filedate_assist(t_filedate *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00038 {
00039     if (m==1) {
00040         switch (a) {
00041             case 0: sprintf(s,"File/Folder to Check Modification Date"); break;
00042         }
00043     } 
00044     else if (m==2) {
00045         switch (a) {
00046             case 0: sprintf(s,"Mod Date (Month/Day/Year/Hour/Min/Sec)"); break;
00047         }
00048     }
00049 }
00050 
00051 void filedate_anything(t_filedate *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00052 {
00053     defer(x,(method)filedate_doanything,s,argc,argv);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void filedate_doanything(t_filedate *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00057 {   
00058     char filename[MAX_PATH_CHARS];
00059     short vol,err;
00060     long type;
00061     unsigned long date;
00062     
00063     if (s == ps_nothing)
00064         return;
00065     strcpy(filename,s->s_name);
00066     if (!locatefile_extended(filename,&vol,&type,&type,-1)) {   // look for all files
00067         err = path_getfilemoddate(filename,vol,&date);          // find the date of the file
00068         if (err) {
00069             object_error((t_object *)x, "%s: error %d getting date",s->s_name,err);
00070             return;
00071         }
00072         filedate_out(x,date);
00073     } else {        // now check for a folder, you need to copy the name again
00074                     // since locatefile_extended may have changed it
00075         strcpy(filename,s->s_name);
00076         if (!path_resolvefile(filename,0,&vol)) {   // returns false if it found a file or folder
00077                                                     // the logic here is that a folder, which wouldn't be
00078                                                     // found by locatefile_extended would be the
00079                                                     // only thing found here
00080             err = path_getmoddate(vol,&date);       // find the date of the path, not the file
00081             if (!err) {
00082                 filedate_out(x,date);
00083                 return;
00084             } else {
00085                 object_error((t_object *)x, "%s: error %d getting date",s->s_name,err);
00086                 return;
00087             }
00088         }
00089         object_error((t_object *)x, "%s: can't find",s->s_name);
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void filedate_out(t_filedate *x, unsigned long date)
00094 {
00095     t_datetime dtr;
00096     t_atom list[16];
00097     
00098     systime_secondstodate(date,&dtr);   // convert the date to a readable record
00099     SETLONG(list,dtr.month);
00100     SETLONG(list+1,dtr.day);
00101     SETLONG(list+2,dtr.year);
00102     SETLONG(list+3,dtr.hour);
00103     SETLONG(list+4,dtr.minute);
00104     SETLONG(list+5,dtr.second);
00105     outlet_list(x->f_ob.o_outlet,ps_list,6,list);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void *filedate_new(void)
00109 {
00110     t_filedate *x;
00111     
00112     x = (t_filedate *)newobject(filedate_class);
00113     outlet_new((t_object *)x,0);
00114     return x;
00115 }
